vsParam:
OK, we've got rid of the Punis on our side.
Hop, how is it going with you?

Huff... puff...
F-finally... I drove it away...

Oh, you drove it away...
You didn't kill it, but fine, I'll give you a pass.

Great! I did it!
I'm one step closer to being a fairy like Peppermint!
... By the way, why does Hop look up to Peppermint?

Look, she, um...
She's got nothing... for anyone to look up to?

Hey—! What are you talking about, Cresson?!
Darn, are you nuts?! Is it because of your hair?!

Ouch ouch! I mean it. You have nothing for anyone to look up to!
You don't deserve any respect! Ouch ouch!

You're wrong. She deserves my respect, totally!
The best thing about her is that she's not hypocritical at all!

She's fearless of nothing, whether it's aged fairies,
monsters, or humans...

That's why she impresses me the most!
So I want to follow her example and be a girl like her!

... Huh? Be a "girl"... like her?
Wait, you're a boy, aren't you, Hop?

Huh? No no.
Hop is a girl. What are you talking about?

Uh—!? No way!? I always thought Hop is a he!
Well... She looks like a boy.

What are you talking about?! I am a girl!
A charming and sexy... girl—!!

Why don't you trust me!?
I look like a girl in any way! I even wear a flower!!

You didn't notice I'm a girl until I told you!?
Boohoo, you've gone too far...

Hahaha... Sorry.
I thought you were a boy too...

Um... Hop...
Do you want to be a girl like Peppermint... Good luck.

Um~ Everyone thought I'm a boy...
It seems I should work on my charm... Sigh.
